title: "Tesla files to use new ‘millimeter-wave radar’ on its ‘full self-driving’ electric cars"
excerpt: "Tesla has applied with the FCC for the use of a new “millimeter-wave radar” for Autopilot and Full Self-Driving in its electric cars. New Tesla Radar Tesla uses a front-facing radar sensor hidden inside the front fascia of its vehicles as part of its Autopilot/Full Self-Driving (FSD) sensor suite."
